subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: James Reimer made 43 saves and all three Toronto players scored in the shootout against Martin Brodeur to lead the Maple Leafs to a 4-3 victory over the Devils in Newark.
snippet: James Reimer made 43 saves and all three Toronto players scored in the shootout against Martin Brodeur to lead the Maple Leafs to a 4-3 victory over the Devils in Newark.
